categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Colonel Vorr was a Human male officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War against the Galactic Republic. He was stationed on Ord Mantell, secretly supporting the Mantellian Separatist Movement. He was killed along his men in 3643 BBY, by a promising Republic Special Forces Division sergeant, acting as a distraction and occupying the Sergeant long enough for the defecting Havoc Squad to escape.
